verses.verse: Now the LORD<WH3068> had said<WH559> to Abram,<WH87> Get<WH3212> you out of your country,<WH776> and from your kindred,<WH4138> and from your father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> to a land<WH776> that I will show<WH7200> you:
And I will make<WH6213> of you a great<WH1419> nation,<WH1471> and I will bless<WH1288> you, and make your name<WH8034> great;<WH1431> and you shall be a blessing:<WH1293>
And I will bless<WH1288> them that bless<WH1288> you, and curse<WH779> him that curses<WH7043> you: and in you shall all<WH3605> families<WH4940> of the earth<WH127> be blessed.<WH1288>

So Abram<WH87> departed,<WH3212> as the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to him; and Lot<WH3876> went<WH3212> with him: and Abram<WH87> was seventy<WH7657> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he departed<WH3318> out of Haran.<WH2771>

And Abram<WH87> took<WH3947> Sarai<WH8297> his wife,<WH802> and Lot<WH3876> his brother's<WH251> son,<WH1121> and all<WH3605> their substance<WH7399> that they had gathered,<WH7408> and the souls<WH5315> that they had gotten<WH6213> in Haran;<WH2771> and they went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to go<WH3212> into the land<WH776> of Canaan;<WH3667> and into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> they came.<WH935>
And Abram<WH87> passed<WH5674> through the land<WH776> to the place<WH4725> of Sichem,<WH7927> to the plain<WH436> of Moreh.<WH4176> And the Canaanite<WH3669> was then<WH227> in the land.<WH776>

And the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to Abram,<WH87> and said,<WH559> To your seed<WH2233> will I give<WH5414> this<WH2063> land:<WH776> and there<WH8033> built<WH1129> he an altar<WH4196> to the LORD,<WH3068> who appeared<WH7200> to him.

And he removed<WH6275> from there<WH8033> to a mountain<WH2022> on the east<WH6924> of Bethel,<WH1008> and pitched<WH5186> his tent,<WH168> having Bethel<WH1008> on the west,<WH3220> and Hai<WH5857> on the east:<WH6924> and there<WH8033> he built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> to the LORD,<WH3068> and called<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>
And Abram<WH87> journeyed,<WH5265> going<WH1980> on still<WH5265> toward the south.<WH5045>

And there was a famine<WH7458> in the land:<WH776> and Abram<WH87> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714> to sojourn<WH1481> there;<WH8033> for the famine<WH7458> was grievous<WH3515> in the land.<WH776>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when<WH834> he was come<WH7126> near<WH7126> to enter<WH935> into<WH935> Egypt,<WH4714> that he said<WH559> to Sarai<WH8297> his wife,<WH802> Behold<WH2009> now,<WH4994> I know<WH3045> that you are a fair<WH3303> woman<WH802> to look<WH4758> on:

Therefore it shall come to pass, when<WH3588> the Egyptians<WH4713> shall see<WH7200> you, that they shall say,<WH559> This<WH2063> is his wife:<WH802> and they will kill<WH2026> me, but they will save<WH2421> you alive.<WH2421>
Say,<WH559> I pray<WH4994> you, you are my sister:<WH269> that it may be well<WH3190> with me for your sake;<WH5668> and my soul<WH5315> shall live<WH2421> because<WH1558> of you.
And it came<WH1961> to pass, that, when Abram<WH87> was come<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> the Egyptians<WH4713> beheld<WH7200> the woman<WH802> that she was very<WH3966> fair.<WH3303>
The princes<WH8269> also of Pharaoh<WH6547> saw<WH7200> her, and commended<WH1984> her before<WH413> Pharaoh:<WH6547> and the woman<WH802> was taken<WH3947> into Pharaoh's<WH6547> house.<WH1004>

And he entreated Abram<WH87> well<WH3190> for her sake:<WH5668> and he had<WH1961> sheep,<WH6629> and oxen,<WH1241> and he asses,<WH2543> and menservants,<WH5650> and maidservants,<WH8198> and she asses,<WH860> and camels.<WH1581>
And the LORD<WH3068> plagued<WH5060> Pharaoh<WH6547> and his house<WH1004> with great<WH1419> plagues<WH5061> because<WH5921> <WH1697> of Sarai<WH8297> Abram's<WH87> wife.<WH802>
And Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> Abram <WH87>and said,<WH559> What<WH4100> is this<WH2063> that you have done<WH6213> to me? why<WH4100> did you not tell<WH5046> me that she was your wife?<WH802>

Why<WH4100> said<WH559> you, She is my sister?<WH269> so I might have taken<WH3947> her to me to wife:<WH802> now<WH6258> therefore behold<WH2009> your wife,<WH802> take<WH3947> her, and go<WH3212> your way.
And Pharaoh<WH6547> commanded<WH6680> his men<WH582> concerning<WH5921> him: and they sent<WH7971> him away, and his wife,<WH802> and all<WH3605> that he had.
